text: We attest that we will retain data collected through our Zoom integration only for as long as necessary to perform our Zoom integration's functions or other purposes we have disclosed.
(11) Aitemasu will retain data from Zoom until the user disconnect zoom account from our app or the user delete their account.

(13) Aitemasu will get Zoom OAuth Tokens for generating zoom meeting url, Zoom ID for generating zoom meeting url, Zoom account ID for just in case and Token expire_in for refreshing access token through Zoom API.
